name: Present Extractor 5000
description:
Submission to 32bit Holiday Jam 2021

made by me.

 Controls:

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

RMB(Right mouse button) to pick up presents

You can check how many presents you have by looking at the top left.

LMB(Left mouse button) when you have a bat to extract a present that way.

The bat only has 3 uses though.

RMB(Right mouse button) to extract a present while facing an extractor(the yellow box that looks like hell is spilling out of it). Make sure you actually have a present while doing this. When you extract a present

You will be timed. Extract presents to gain time.

Run out of time and you lose

also idk why the extractors have white backgrounds when i made the downloadable version it was fine
